SELECT a.spSeq ,a.spName ,a.spPrice ,a.spDesc ,a.spTotal ,a.spRemain ,a.spStart ,a.spDelNy ,a.spArea ,a.spEatNy ,a.spRentalNy ,a.spRegDate ,a.port_ptSeq ,d.ptName ,d.ptLatitude ,d.ptLongitude ,GROUP_CONCAT(c.fsName ORDER BY c.fsSeq) AS fsNameList FROM ship a left join fishandship b on b.ship_spSeq = a.spSeq left join fish c on c.fsSeq = b.fish_fsSeq left join port d on d.ptSeq = a.port_ptSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.spSeq = #{spSeq} GROUP BY a.spSeq
